name: TOLKENTAUS
description:
TOLKENTAUS is a coin flipping RPG adventure. Live by luck or perish by chance in totally random coin combat.

Explore to find all three sacred keys, and pick up some potions along the way to keep yourself alive.

This game was created for LOWREZJAM 2021.

Arrow Keys: Move

P-Key: Use Potion

Space: Confirm/Start

Follow on Twitter or Itch for a full postmortem.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/jonah_srg
